bibl.title: Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity.

bibl.seg: CASEAU Béatrice, Objects in Churches: The Testimony of Inventories. Avec résumé en anglais.
Luke LAVAN, Ellen SWIFT and Toon PUTZEYS (Edd.), Objects in Context, Objects in Use. Material Spatiality in Late Antiquity = Late Antique Archaeology. 5 (Leiden - Boston, 2007) pp. 551-579.

Introduction. - Methodological issues. - Church plate. - Architectural decoration and lighting. - Furniture - seats. - Textiles. - Incense and censers. - Conclusion. - Appendix: The inventory of Ibion [P. Grenf. II, 111].
